title: Talking about Women, Marriage, Islam and Pornography
description:
Title: Talking about Women, Marriage, Islam and Pornography
Language: English
Reviewing: Osama Emara
Publisher: Website of the Deenshow: http://www.thedeenshow.com
Short Discription: In this episode, Sh. Omar Suleiman discusses the issues of pornography women and marriage in Islam. He shows that hijab is to honor and elevate women not to punish them. Meanwhile, he confirms that if a person wants to get a worldly prestige, s/he has sacrifice. He shows deep meanings regarding hijab and the dangerous results of pornography for both boys and girls.
Addition Date: 2013-08-05
Short Link: http://IslamHouse.com/438279
